snippet: The decision was seen by some as an effort to tamp down criticism over Russian meddling in the American presidential campaign on behalf of Donald Trump....
abstract: Cybercriminal Joshua Samuel Aaron, who American authorities charge stole hundreds of millions of dollars from Wall Street banks, is arrested at John F Kennedy International Airport after being deported by Russia; his capture comes amid severe criticism of Russia for possibly influencing United States presidential election through cyberattacks.
lead_paragraph: The decision was seen by some as an effort to tamp down criticism over Russian meddling in the American presidential campaign on behalf of Donald Trump.

headline.main: Russia Turns Over American Cybertheft Suspect to the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Russia Sends a Fugitive Back to U.S.
